title: Twitter adds private Circles, taking a page from Google+
content:
Twitter has recently announced that it’s adding a new feature for users who want to share tweets privately with others. The new feature is called “Circles” and seems awfully reminiscent of what Google+ had to offer, back in the day.

more…

The post Twitter adds private Circles, taking a page from Google+ appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Twitter has added a new feature to its arsenal of privacy features. this one is called Twitter Circles.
